conbody.p: Each Intelligent Environments service consists of an API layer, WebSocket services, and a query engine.
The following graphic illustrates the Intelligent Environments Service components:

section.title: REST API Layer and Websocket Services
section.p: Client applications can access data using service REST API endpoints. Your application makes an HTTPS request and parses the response. Requests for live data provide a Websocket link. To retrieve WebSocket data, you must use a WebSocket client.
You can use any webdevelopment language to access the APIs.

section.title: Query Engine
section.p: The query engine enables developers to use JSON to retrieve data about any object or any object property.
